skill.name: Happy game
skill.description: Give all allies dark attribute character  **Happy Memories** effect for **3 turns.**
skill.upgrade: **After strengthening :** Grant all allies dark attribute characters **Legato** effects for **3 turns**  and increase burst value by **30%**

effect.name: Legato
effect.description: increase Burst gain value from any source by **35%** for **3 Turns**

effect.name: Happy Memories
effect.description: Increase **Attack Power** by **30%**, **Defense Power** by **30% ,** **enhanced** & **Heavy Attack Probability** by **25%** , **Resistance to Abnormal Status** by **60%** ; normal attack adds **25% damage** (Cannot be dispelled)

skill.name: Pass the ball!
skill.description: Inflict on a single enemy  **4 times** **126%** dark attribute damage, and give 1 layer of **Defense Down(Stackable)** effect; restore all our character **400+10%max Health.**
skill.upgrade: **After strengthening :** Increase Damage  **126% -> 130% ;** decrease cooldown from  **4 -> 3** turn ; if herself have **Happy Memories** effect gain own burst value by 10%

effect.name: Defense down (stackable)
effect.description: Decrease enemy defense by 10% , stack up to 3 layers

resonance.name: Waves Pitching
resonance.description: Inflicts **420%** dark attribute damage to all enemies and grant all allies shield effect , if herself have **Happy Memories**  effect, then dispel 1 additional **buff** status from all enemies.
resonance.upgrade: **After strengthening :** grants 1 layer to self **Phantom Effect.**

passive.name: Unexpected Encounter~
passive.description: At the end of the round, if Lulu take no damage or 0 damage , the cooldown of **Pass the ball!** will be refreshed

passive.name: Glory Volleyball
passive.description: Increase Resonance(Skill) damage and Resonance(skill) damage limit of all allies dark attribute character

passive.name: Synchronized Blessing
passive.description: Using  **Waves Pitching** will refresh cooldown skill of **Pass the ball!**
